page.title: 18EVENTS
page.content: Each year a Gala is held in Crosshill during the first week of June.The Gala Queen is chosen by the school pupils from the girls in Primary 7 class. This year many of the activities due to take place during the week were cancelled .The crowning of the Queen was followed by a procession through the village to the football ground where a fete and mini-sports took place. In Kirkmichael the Gala Queen is chosen by the teenagers. Each day there is an event involving different groups of people so that all ages are catered for.The highlights of the week are the car treasure hunt on Wednesday and the buffet dance on Friday held in the school. The Gala Week is organised by a committee of the villagers.
